name: Connors War
description:
Connors War
You are one of the few survivors of the Great Connors War now you must fight to survive. Kill your enemy the Raiders an army of Evil Hungry Box's who try to eat you! Get revenge by killing every Raider you can find but be careful they have a nasty bite. Score points by killing Raiders and completing objectives as you adventure through the world of Connortopia.

Update 0.2.6

New Enemy design

New road system (Temporary)

New house models and props

Minor fixes and improvements

Lore
The Raiders a people shaped like boxes invaded Connortopia and began eating people, now few are left and now the Raiders are every where. The people of Connortopia put up a good fight but it was not enough to stop the endless waves of raiders.

No one knows were the Raiders come from, outer space, mad science experiment gone wrong all we Know is one day they started showing up and eating people like crazy. The people of Connortopia fought hard but it was not enough. Now only a small resistance remains.

Note: Game still in development and things may change.This game is in Pre-Alpha and is not yet complete please with hold judgement and provide feed back to improve the game. The game will improve before the final version.

System Requirements: TBA
